text: @SteveGuest @realDonaldTrump 120000, he made the mistake by saying 120 million. What about Donald not knowing what stealth meant, not knowing what the nuclear triad was thinking the Coronavirus outsmarted antibiotics or drinking Clorox or tariffs. Biden mistake of 1 word trump mistakes of billions of dollars
